name: Noble Blade
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: You may move another unit that is adjacent to the target 1 space.
_("Another unit" never includes you)_

name: Ceremonial Blade
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: You may move a minion adjacent to the target 1 space.

name: Spell Break
text: **This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius cannot perform skill actions or play reaction cards.

name: Dangerous Current
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in a line of 2 spaces behind the target discards a card or is defeated.

name: Raging Stream
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in any of the 3 spaces in a straight line directly behind the target discards a card or is defeated.

name: Violent Torrent
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in any of the 5 spaces in a straight line directly behind the target discards a card or is defeated.
*May repeat once on a different unit.*

name: Rogue Wave
text: Target a unit in range. After the attack: You may push an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

name: Tidal Blast
text: Target a unit in range. After the attack: You may push an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

name: Liquid Leap
text: Place yourself into a space in range without a spawn point and not adjacent to an empty spawn point.

name: Magical Current
text: Place yourself into a space in range without a spawn point and not adjacent to an empty spawn point.

name: Arcane Whirlpool
text:
Swap with an enemy minion in range.
(*Swap places with the target. This is not movement.*)

name: Stranger Tide
text: Place yourself into a space in range without a spawn point.

name: Ebb and Flow
text:
Swap with an enemy minion in range.
If it was adjacent to you, you may repeat once.

name: Aspiring Duelist
text:
Ignore all minion defense modifiers.
_(This includes your minions, as well as enemy minions)_

name: Expert Duelist
text:
Ignore all minion defense modifiers.
**This turn:** You are immune to attack actions of all enemy heroes, except this attacker.

name: Slippery Ground
text: **This turn:** Enemy heroes adjacent to you cannot fast travel or move more than 1 space with a movement action.

name: Master Duelist
text:
*Ignore all minion defense modifiers.*
**This round:** You are immune to attack actions of all enemy heroes, except this attacker.

name: Deluge
text: **This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius cannot fast travel, or move more than 1 space with a movement action.

name: Living Tsunami
text: Once per turn, before performing an Attack action, you may move 1 space.
